Hi Hagop,   

I tried to call you but couldn’t make it for a short discussion about, how we help our Fortune 500 Clients leverage the capabilities of Boomi to transform your application development processes. 

 

We realize our vision of Connected Systems, People, and Processes efficiently, empowering you to achieve new levels of excellence by combining our deep industry knowledge with the capabilities of Boomi. Our Integration Centre of Excellence (COE) is built on extensive experience and a solid foundation in best practices, allowing us to partner strategically with Boomi to deliver tangible business value.

We realize our vision of Connected Systems, People, and Processes efficiently, empowering you to achieve new levels of excellence by combining our deep industry knowledge with the capabilities of Boomi. Our Integration Centre of Excellence (COE) is built on extensive experience and a solid foundation in best practices, allowing us to partner strategically with Boomi to deliver tangible business value. 

 

I would be happy to discuss how TechnePlus and Boomi can transform your operations and enhance the educational experience. Please let me know a convenient time for us to connect, or feel free to reach out directly. 

I’d love to connect and explore how we can work together. What does your schedule look like next week?   

Cheers,

Bhumi

chunks.text:
I wanted to seek your time if that works to discuss our transformative IT services focused on enhancing efficiency, reducing costs, and driving growth for our clients through cutting-edge technology solutions.

Our Capabilities Includes:  

*	Hyper-Automation – Our automation includes advanced technologies like AI, UI Path, and robotics to automate repetitive tasks by 30%, allowing your team to focus on optimizing workflows and reducing manual tasks.   

*	Digital Consulting – We help businesses define and execute digital strategies to streamline workflow and improve customer experiences, ensuring a seamless integration of skilled professionals into your projects.  

*	Integration Expertise- Our Integration capabilities enable end-to-end solutions to connect and integrate different systems to work harmoniously, improving collaboration and data exchange by 40%.  

*	Data Analytics – Our advanced analytic solution provides insights into customers, products and operations, enabling data-driven decisions which led to a 25% increase in decision- making efficiency.   

*	Application Services – Our team develops customized, scalable applications using the latest technologies to support business growth.   

Client Success: We proudly support over 15 Fortune 500 companies by implementing our digital transformation solutions. Highlighting below our success rate   

*	Efficiency Boost: Achieved a 35% reduction in processing time for key operations.  

*	Cost Saving: Delivered annual savings of over $ 2 million.

Thanks

Bhumi
